thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 6 of 457
thread.title: Jerry John

author: Jerry John
title: Jerry John
text: Everyone was fun and welcoming! All the advisors and management staff made for an easy and pleasing experience. Everything was explained up front. No pressure was given. The most pleasant car buying experience we've ever had. Za'nona is the best at providing the exact cars we wanted to choose from. She allowed us to make our decision then sold us from there. And "sold us" in a fantastic way. Thanks to everyone at the Orlando Drivetime on East Colonial.
